pages.title: Grow Blocks
pages.text: Mushrooms can only grow on blocks included in the $(thing)#resourceshrooms:mushroom_grow_block$() tag.

pages.title: Mutation Blocks
pages.text: When a mushroom tries to spread onto a block in the $(thing)#resourceshrooms:mushroom_mutation_block$() tag the chance of a mutation is doubled.

pages.title: Stable Blocks
pages.text: When a mushroom tries to spread onto a block in the $(thing)#resourceshrooms:mushroom_stable_block$() tag it is not possible to for it to mutate. This is useful when building farms.
